sweat, baby sweat

2003-06-13

There was a whole lotta perspiring goin on. I was dripping from everywhere. Spin swing and gypsy... movement connections and beauty. The first dance of the evening was one written for Thomas Jefferson. Being old, it has lots of time to goof around between the moves, so I had a blast doing it.

Radiohead has a new video with cute furry animals.
